Not sure who of nerdy twitter needs to hear this but open data and geojson have literally reshaped how we see a pandemic and its inequities.

Meanwhile, the BCCDC has established they have ongoing daily data on the vaccine status of new cases.
It would be helpful if they could proactively share that with the public in an open data format, instead of a static line chart with no numbers.
